TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定義值來指定要如何調整資料列的高度。

span.span: Defines values for specifying how the heights of rows are adjusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可以調整其每個資料列的慣用高度為基礎的資料列。The control can resize its rows based on the preferred height of each row. 慣用的資料列高度會顯示該資料列中的最大資料格的值所需的最小高度。The preferred row height is the minimum height required to display the largest cell value in that row. 大小不同模式可讓您指出哪些儲存格用來計算新的高度 （標頭資料格或非標題儲存格），以及是否要調整所有資料列或目前顯示的資料列的大小。Different size modes let you indicate which cells are used to calculate the new heights (either header cells or nonheader cells) and whether to resize all rows or only the rows that are currently displayed. 調整大小的資料列子集適合使用 多個資料列時，避免對效能帶來負面影響。Resizing a subset of rows is useful to avoid a performance penalty when working with many rows of data. 以內容為基礎的自動調整大小，可防止使用者調整資料列的高度，以滑鼠。Content-based automatic resizing prevents users from adjusting row heights with the mouse. 這個列舉型別由控制屬性和方法。This enumeration is used by the control property and method. 如需有關調整大小模式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about sizing modes, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定儲存格的內容變更時，會自動重新調整其高度的資料列。The following code example sets rows to automatically resize their height whenever cell contents change. 新的資料列高度會決定從所有資料列和資料行的內容。The new row height is determined from the contents of all rows and columns. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 自動調整大小的資料格時的內容變更 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Automatically Resize Cells When Content Changes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing/CPP/autosizing.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing/CS/autosizing.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing/VB/autosizing.vb#9)]

related.span: Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項

span.span: Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control

related.span: 如何：在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的內容變更時自動調整儲存格大小

span.span: How to: Automatically Resize Cells When Content Changes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode AllCells = int32(7)

summary.span: 資料列高度會調整，以適合資料列中的所有儲存格的內容 (包括標題儲存格)。

span.span: The row heights adjust to fit the contents of all cells in the rows, including header cells.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode AllCellsExceptHeaders = int32(6)

summary.span: 資料列高度會調整，以適合資料列中的所有儲存格的內容 (不包括標題儲存格)。

span.span: The row heights adjust to fit the contents of all cells in the rows, excluding header cells.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode AllHeaders = int32(5)

summary.span: 資料列高度會調整，以適合資料列行首的內容。

span.span: The row heights adjust to fit the contents of the row header.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode DisplayedCells = int32(11)

summary.span: 資料列高度會調整，以適合目前顯示在螢幕上的資料列中所有儲存格的內容 (包括標題儲存格)。

span.span: The row heights adjust to fit the contents of all cells in rows currently displayed onscreen, including header cells.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode DisplayedCellsExceptHeaders = int32(10)

summary.span: 資料列高度會調整，以適合目前顯示在螢幕上的資料列中所有儲存格的內容 (不包括標題儲存格)。

span.span: The row heights adjust to fit the contents of all cells in rows currently displayed onscreen, excluding header cells.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode DisplayedHeaders = int32(9)

summary.span: 資料列高度會調整，以適合目前顯示在螢幕上的資料列行首的內容。

span.span: The row heights adjust to fit the contents of the row headers currently displayed onscreen.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode None = int32(0)

summary.span: 資料列高度不會自動調整。

span.span: The row heights do not automatically adjust.
